script.name: plugin.GNS.Add.Article
script.description: Adds Dynamic News articles to the system

line.comment: * check if id is already existing and skip, if yes and remove timed out news
* priority mustn't be lower than 0 and not greater than 100
* get values for GNS from the input
* select the right handling for the sector.or.race-argument
* add the rest of the values
* choose the right place for inclusion into the dynamic news list
* get racestring from texts inside 9500 and races array

sval.val: Adds Dynamic News articles to the system
check if id is already existing and skip, if yes and remove timed out news
priority mustn't be lower than 0 and not greater than 100
get values for GNS from the input
select the right handling for the sector.or.race-argument
add the rest of the values
choose the right place for inclusion into the dynamic news list
get racestring from texts inside 9500 and races array
